1.name: Oolong Tea
1.desc:
An oxidized Chinese tea. Different flavors and fragrances can be bought out depending on the degree of oxidation.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Maki, Shuichi

2.name: Boba Tea
2.desc:
A popular drink with a bunch of tapioca balls at the bottom. The chewy tapioca balls are made from the root of the cassava plant.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Kaede, Kokichi, Maki, Miu, Rantaro, Tenko

3.name: Ginger Tea
3.desc:
Hot water with grated ginger in it. It warms the body and prevents colds. It tastes delicious with honey mixed in.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Himiko, Kirumi, Ryoma, Shuichi, Tenko, Tsumugi

4.name: Cleopatra's Pearl Cocktail
4.desc:
A drink based on the story of Cleopatra dissolving one of her pearl earrings in a cup of vinegar. Said to be good for beauty.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Himiko, Kaede, Kirumi, Korekiyo, Maki, Miu, Rantaro, Tenko, Tsumugi

5.name: Non-Alcoholic Drink of Immortality
5.desc:
A non-alcoholic drink based on a legendary alcoholic beverage said to make the drinker immortal. It neither grants immorality, nor does it taste good.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Kokichi, Miu, Rantaro, Ryoma, Tsumugi

6.name: Ketchup
6.desc:
An exclusive writing instrument for a maid to use to write messages on omelettes. Considered a normal condiment by some people.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kirumi

7.name: Sugar
7.desc:
A basic seasoning that's primarily made up of sucrose. Be careful not to consume too much of it.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Himiko, Gonta, Kirumi

8.name: Oliver Oil
8.desc:
A vegetable oil created from olives. If you wielded it correctly, it will make you look cool as you cook.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kirumi, Rantaro

9.name: Astro Cake
9.desc:
A freeze-dried slice of cake sold to the public as space food. It's both healthy and vegetarian-friendly.
*Love*: None
*Like*: All but K1-B0

10.name: Bubble Gum Bomb
10.desc:
A gum that makes an explosive sound when it's fully blown and popped. Weak-hearted people should not chew it.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Kokichi, Miu, Tenko

11.name: Maple Fudge
11.desc:
A British candy that's made by boiling down sugar, condensed milk, and butter, and then adding maple syrup. It's really sweet.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Maki

12.name: Greek Yogurt
12.desc:
A food that's made by straining water from plain yogurt. The thick taste is popular and used in several dishes.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Gonta, Kaede, Kirumi, Rantaro, Tsumugi

13.name: Bunny Apples
13.desc:
Apples cut into bunny shapes. Often use as bait for certain animals and insects.
*Love*: Gonta
*Like*: Himiko, Maki, Miu

14.name: Rock Hard Ice Cream
14.desc:
A cup of ice cream engineered to never melt. It can be carried around for a long time, even in summer. But it's so hard, ordinary spoons cant penetrate it.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Gonta, Kaito, Kokichi, Miu, Tenko

15.name: Sukiyaki Caramel
15.desc:
Sukiyaki-flavored caramels that combine the flavors of meat, soy sauce, eggs, and caramel. The flavors are all really strong and don't mix well.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kokichi, Miu

16.name: Candy Cigarette
16.desc:
A sweet cigarette-shaped candy. It's popular among kids who want to imitate adults.
*Love*: Ryoma
*Like*: Himiko

17.name: Gyoza In the Shape of a Face
17.desc:
A dumpling that's modeled after someone you swear you've seen somewhere before. The skin is thick and it's a little tough.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Kokichi, Tsumugi, Shuichi

18.name: Silver Earring
18.desc:
A simple earring that can look good on anyone. It's causally stylish.
*Love*: Rantaro
*Like*: Angie, Ryoma, Maki

19.name: Crystal Bangle
19.desc:
A bangle made out of common crystal glass. It's sparkly and draws quite a bit of attention.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Himiko, Kaede, Kirumi, Maki, Miu, Rantaro, Tsumugi

20.name: Striped Necktie
20.desc:
A stylist tie both men and women can wear. It's convenient to have one around for special occasions.
*Love*: Gonta
*Like*: Kaede, Kirumi, Rantaro, Tsumugi

21.name: Bondage Boots
21.desc:
Enamel boots fit for a queen. They have high heels and long laces decorated with a chain. Made to be worn as shoes, but usable as art or an umbrella holder.
*Love*: Miu
*Like*: Himiko, Korekiyo, Tsumugi

22.name: Ultimate Academy Bracelet
22.desc:
A handcuff bracelet with the crest for the Ultimate Academy emblazoned on it. It is a symbol of friendship, even in the face of death and despair.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Miu

23.name: Workout Clothes
23.desc:
Easy-to-move workout clothes that wick away any sweat. With these, you can work out all day and still be comfortable.
*Love*: Tenko
*Like*: Gonta, Kaito, Maki, Ryoma, Shuichi, Tsumugi

24.name: Mono-Jinbei
24.desc:
Popular Japanese summer clothes colored black and white, like Monokuma. It's easy to move around in, and breaths well.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Himiko, K1-B0, Kaito, Tenko

25.name: Autumn-Colored Scarf
25.desc:
A chic autumn-colored scarf that can be used by men, women, and robots. It is very trendy and a fashionable accent to any outfit.
*Love*: None
*Like*: K1-B0, Kirumi, Kokichi, Rantaro, Ryoma, Tsumugi

26.name: Hand-Knit Sweater
26.desc:
A sweater that's been knitted with love in every stitch. Those who wear it can feel themselves enveloped in the power of love and will stay warm through even the coldest winter.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Tenko

27.name: Cheer Coat Uniform
27.desc:
A long coat with passionate red lining. It protects you from the cold and makes you burn with passion.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Gonta, Kaito, Tsumugi

28.name: Nail Brush
28.desc:
A brush for painting nails beautifully. With this, anyone can make their nails sparkle like magic.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Kaede, Kirumi, Korekiyo, Maki, Tsumugi

29.name: Wearable Blanket
29.desc:
A blanket that will completely defend you from the cold by closing off any gaps around you hands, neck, and feet. Moving around in it is near impossible.
*Like*: Himiko, Kokichi

30.name: Beret
30.desc:
A size-adjustable beret. It's a pretty popular hat that lets you trendy and somewhat artistic.
*Love*: Angie, Rantaro
*Like*: Kaede, Maki, Ryoma, Tsumugi

31.name: Ladybug Brooch
31.desc:
A cute and fashionable brooch that resembles a seven-spotted ladybug. Despite how realistic it looks, it is not alive.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Gonta, Himiko, Kaede, Kirumi, Kokichi, Maki, Miu, Rantaro, Ryoma, Tenko, Tsumugi

32.name: Cufflinks
32.desc:
An accessory that is attached to the cuffs of a shirt. The black onyx design makes it look good on both men and women.
*Love*: Gonta
*Like*: Himiko, Kaede, Kiurmi, Kokichi, Korekiyo, Maki, Rantaro, Ryoma, Tenko, Tsumugi

33.name: Dog Tag
33.desc:
A dog tag used to identity soldiers. The same profile is engraved on two plates so that if the owner is killed, one is collected to report death.
*Love*: Ryoma
*Like*: Kokichi, Maki, Miu, Rantaro, Tsumugi

34.name: White Robot Mustache
34.desc:
A gentlemanly mustache that can be stuck on robots. Does not include antenna functions or earthquake powers.
*Love*: K1-B0
*Like*: Kaito, Tsumugi

35.name: Book of the Blackened
35.desc:
A book of criminal offenses that contains records of the cruelest, most atrocious murders committed by humans. Many of these cases weren't released to the public.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kokichi, Korekiyo, Tsumugi

36.name: Feelings of Ham
36.desc:
How to raise hamsters...is not what this book is about. It's a book about raising domestic animals for meat. For those who are interested in the farming industry.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Kokichi, Korekiyo, Miu

37.name: Travel Journal
37.desc:
A thick journal packed with record of trips. However, it was actually written using vague knowledge and the rich imagination of someone looking at a world map.
*Love*: Shuichi
*Like*: K1-B0, Kaede, Kokichi, Korekiyo, Maki, Rantaro, Ryoma, Tenko

38.name: Dreams Come True -- Spell Book
38.desc:
A book that contains old magic gathered from all over the country and collected into an easy to read volume for kids. Any dangerous have been removed, so only love spells are left.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Himiko, Korekiyo, Miu, Tenko

39.name: Story of Tokono
39.desc:
A collection of stories about the customs, legends, and knowledge of civilizations from long ago. It has a high scientific value.
*Love*: Korekiyo, Miu 
*Like*: Angie, Kaito

40.name: Spla-Teen Vogue
40.desc:
A teen magazine featuring many models just enjoying their summer. This magazine is meant for kids, not squids.
*Love*: Kaito
*Like*: None

41.name: Fun Book of Animals
41.desc:
An animal picture book for preschool kids. For some reason, bears are not featured in it.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Gonta, Maki, Miu

42.name: Latest Machine Parts Catalogue
42.desc:
A comprehensive catalog that features the latest cables, screws, motors, etc. It could be considered a fashion magazine for robots.
*Love*: K1-B0
*Like*: Miu

43.name: Stainless Tray
43.desc:
A circular silver tray that shines like a mirror. It is befitting of a maid.
*Love*: Kirumi
*Like*: Tsumugi, Rantaro

44.name: Tennis Ball Set
44.desc:
A standard tennis ball four-pack set. Not only is it used for tennis, but it's also used for massage and weight loss exercises.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kaito, Kaede, Tenko, Shuichi

45.name: High-End Headphones
45.desc:
Top-grade, high-end headphones. Use these if you truly want to hear the nuances in classical and jazz music.
*Love*: Kaede
*Like*: Himiko, K1-B0, Kaito, Kokichi, Maki, Miu, Rantaro, Ryoma, Shuichi, Tenko, Tsumugi

46.name: Teddy Bear
46.desc:
A typical stuffed toy bear that's not black and white. If you love it enough, then it might come to life one day.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Himiko, Kaede, Maki, Ryoma, Shuichi

47.name: Milk Puzzle
47.desc:
A plain puzzle with one side as white as milk. It's said to be good for concentration training and is used for astronaut selection exams.
*Love*: Kaito
*Like*: Kokichi

48.name: Illusion Rod
48.desc:
A miracle rod that can show a happy illusion when it's spun in circles in front of someone's eyes.
*Love*: Himiko
*Like*: Angie, Shuichi, Tenko, Tsumugi

49.name: Hand Mirror
49.desc:
A pocket-sized mirror that is incredibly useful for checking your appearance.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Kaede, Kirumi, Korekiyo, Maki, Tsumugi

50.name: Prop Carrying Case
50.desc:
A case in high demand by cosplayers for its usability. Not only is it useful for conventions, but it's great for trips too.
*Love*: Tsumugi
*Like*: Rantaro

51.name: Japanese Doll Wig
51.desc:
A glamorous black wig that has hair like that of a Japanese doll. Even if you cut it, it grows back instantly.
*Love*: Tsumugi
*Like*: Korekiyo

52.name: Photoshop Software
52.desc:
A photo editing software that lets you retouch photos. Turn a plain, freckled face into something flashy!
*Love*: Tsumugi
*Like*: Miu

53.name: Sewing Kit
53.desc:
A basic sewing kit that has a needle and several colors of thread. With this, you will always be prepared in case a button comes off.
*Love*: Kirumi, Tsumugi 
*Like*: Korekiyo

54.name: Flame Thunder
54.desc:
A broom that lets mages fly at high speeds when they sit on it. It's a little bent, but it can also be used for cleaning.
*Love*: Himiko, Kirumi
*Like*: Kokichi, Tsumugi

55.name: Tattered Music Score
55.desc:
A tattered handwritten music score. Rumor has it that it's unpublished music from a certain famous composer.
*Love*: Kaede
*Like*: Kokichi, Korekiyo, Rantaro

56.name: Indigo Hakama
56.desc:
Traditional Japanese clothing. This particular kind kind is made of high-quality cotton and used for martial arts. Wear it when it's time to spar.
*Love*: Tenko
*Like*: K1-B0, Kaito, Shuichi, Tsumugi

57.name: Fashionable Glasses
57.desc:
A fashionable accessory that appears to be a pair of glasses, but does not actually correct its wearer's vision.
Love: None
*Like*: Kokichi, Tsumugi

58.name: Gold Origami
58.desc:
An origami pack that has 24 sheets of gold origami paper. With this, you can create gorgeous origami.
Love: None
*Like*: Angie, Himiko

59.name: Plastic Moon Buggy Model
59.desc:
A plastic model of an actual buggy used by astronauts on the moon. It looks plain, but it's actually filled with a burning passion.
*Love*: Kaito
*Like*: Kokichi, Miu, Rantaro, Shuichi

60.name: I'm a Picture Book Artist!
60.desc:
An electronic device that's equipped with an AI to produce a new picture book every time it's turned on. Great for kids who love hearing bed-time stories.
Love: None
*Like*: K1-B0, Maki, Miu

61.name: Hand Grips
61.desc:
A device for grip training. The strength of a punch is determined by grip strength, weight, and speed combined.
Love: None
*Like*: Kaede, Kaito, Maki, Ryoma, Tenko

62.name: Commemorative Medal Set
62.desc:
A medal set Monokuma made of himself and the Monokubs. You can feel the care he put into making it.
*Love*: Kokichi
*Like*: Kaito, Miu, Rantaro, Ryoma, Shuichi

63.name: Metronome
63.desc:
A musical device that is used to match the tempo when playing an instrument. A basic pendulum type.
*Love*: Kaede
*Like*: None

64.name: Sketchbook
64.desc:
An art book for sketches. It's pocket-sized so it's convenient to carry around.
*Love*: Angie
*Like*: Gonta, Korekiyo, Tsumugi

65.name: Art Manikin
65.desc:
A model doll that has the same joints as humans. It's pretty versatile and can stay balanced in positions humans can't maintain.
*Love*: Angie
*Like*: None

66.name: Bird Food
66.desc:
A carefully selected collection of fresh seeds for domestic pigeons. Wild pigeons can't appreciate the increased quality, so it would be a waste to give them these.
*Love*: Himiko
*Like*: None

67.name: Proxilingual Device
67.desc:
A tool that can translate any language, even animal sounds. It can pick up a dog's bark and eloquently describe the emotions in it with an electronic bark.
Love: None
*Like*: Angie, Himiko, Kaito, Kokichi, Korekiyo, Miu, Rantaro, Shuichi

68.name: Gourd Insect Trap
68.desc:
An opaque, gourd-shaped insect keeper. Used for keeping bugs to listen to the noises they make.
*Love*: Gonta
*Like*: None

69.name: Potted Banyan Tree
69.desc:
A potted banyan tree with spirits living inside it. It is said to be good luck. It grows aerial roots from the middle of its trunk.
*Love*: Kaito
*Like*: All but Miu

70.name: Pocket Tissue
70.desc:
A normal package of tissues. It's best to carry it alongside a handkerchief.
*Love*: None
*Like*: None

71.name: Dancing Haniwa
71.desc:
A ceramic figure from the Japanese Kofun period. It is said to resemble a person dancing very intensely.
*Love*: Korekiyo
*Like*: Angie, Kokichi, Tenko

72.name: Work Chair Of Doom
72.desc:
The ultimate work station with a comfy chair and so much technology that you will never want to get up. Those who sit here will be in danger of becoming obese.
*Love*: Miu
*Like*: Himiko, Kokichi, Tsumugi

73.name: 3-Hit KO Sandbag
73.desc:
Regardless of whether it's hit by a kick from a sickly child or a punch from a superhuman adult, this punching bag will always break on the third hit.
*Love*: Tenko
*Like*: Kokichi, Maki

74.name: Sports Towel
74.desc:
A towel that's perfect for hanging around your neck to wipe off sweat. It's the color of the bright, blue sky on a youthful summer day.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kaito, Maki, Ryoma, Tenko

75.name: Steel Glasses Case
75.desc:
A study glasses case that won't break, even if it's stomped on by an Exisal. No matter what abuse it takes, the glasses inside will be kept safe.
*Love*: Gonta, Tsumugi
*Like*: None

76.name: Robot Oil
76.desc:
An oil that's necessary to have when making robots. It has started to separate, so the top half is diluted. Please be sure to shake before use.
*Love*: K1-B0
*Like*: Miu

77.name: Clock-Shaped Gaming Console
77.desc:
A pocket watch-shaped game console with monochrome LCD and several buttons. Play a game called 'Factory' and mash buttons to create more bears!
*Love*: None
*Like*: Himiko, K1-B0, Kaede, Kaito, Kokichi, Miu, Rantaro, Ryoma, Shuichi, Tenko, Tsumug

78.name: Everywhere Parasol
78.desc:
A parasol with a stand so it can be used anywhere. Set it up poolside to feel fancy!
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kaede, Rantaro, Tenko

79.name: Three-Layered Lunch Box
79.desc:
A family-sized lunch box that can fit a variety of side dishes. Perfect for a picnic.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kirumi, Tenko

80.name: Aluminum Water Bottle
80.desc:
A round, retro water bottle. Having it slung over your shoulder makes you want to go on an adventure.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Gonta, Kaito, Rantaro, Tenko

81.name: Jelly Balls
81.desc:
Squishy, colorful beads that swell to marble size when wet. Good for decoration and gardening. Lining up 4 of the same color won't make them vanish.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Himiko, K1-B0, Kaede, Kirumi, Maki, Tenko, Tsumugi

82.name: Upbeat Humidifier
82.desc:
It humidifies your room based on the amount of tears you have shed. Great for gloomy people, but to cheerful people, it's just a paperweight.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kaede, Miu, Shuichi, Tenko

83.name: Earnest Compass
83.desc:
A compass that ignores the North Pole and South Pole, and instead points to the owner's loved ones. A must-have for stalkers.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Korekiyo, Miu, Rantaro, Tenko

84.name: Semazen Doll
84.desc:
A ceramic doll that spins like a Whirling Dervish. It's a very popular Turkish souvenir.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Gonta, Himiko, K1-B0, Korekiyo, Rantaro, Tsumugi

85.name: Weathercock of Barcelous
85.desc:
A weathercock that imitates the Portuguese 'Rooster of Barcelous,' A symbol of the truth, this is a popular souvenir from Portugal.
*Love*: None
*Like*: K1-B0, Kiurmi, Kokichi, Korekiyo, Rantaro, Shuichi, Tsumugi

86.name: Pillow of Admiration
86.desc:
A pillow that helps you sleep well and gives you wonderful dreams. However, the dreams will show an entire lifetime making you feel intensely empty after you wake up.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Kaito, Kirumi, Kokichi, Korekiyo, Miu

87.name: 46 Moves of the Killing Game
87.desc:
A card game with Japanese characters relating to killing games. Some cards are, 'A metal bat to kill demons', 'Blacked are soaked in blood', and 'Certain evidence over arguments'.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kokichi, Korekiyo, Rantaro

88.name: Monkey's Paw
88.desc:
The mummified hand of a monkey said to grant three wishes. However, none of the wishes it grants have happy endings.
*Love*: Korekiyo
*Like*: Angie, Kokichi

89.name: Art Piece of Spring
89.desc:
An ornament that looks like a urinal. The more you look at it, the more you start to question what art *really* is.
*Love*: Angie
*Like*: Miu

90.name: Electric Tempest
90.desc:
A cool high-powered water gun. The water shoots over 10 yards and it can be fired continuously for a whole minute. Fun for kids and adults!
*Love*: Kokichi
*Like*: Kaito, Miu, Tenko

91.name: Space Egg
91.desc:
Object made out of borosilicate glass. Depending on the angle, it changes form. The mysterious pattern is what makes it popular.
*Love*: Maki
*Like*: Angie, Gonta, Himiko, K1-B0, Kaede, Kaito, Kirumi, Rantaro, Tenko, Tsumugi

92.name: Death Flag
92.desc:
The blackened might be one of us, so I refuse to stay with you guys! I'm gonna go hide in my room!
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kokichi

93.name: Survival Flag
93.desc:
The chance of this succeeding is only 5%. No one has ever made it out alive before...but this is my last chance to survive.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Gonta, Kokichi

94.name: Helping Yacchi
94.desc:
A robot mascot that looks like a killer whale. It can sense when it's owner is distressed, and offers a research solution.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Gonta, Himiko, K1-B0, Kaede, Kirumi, Miu, Rantaro, Tsumugi

95.name: Home Planet
95.desc:
A mini planetarium machine that can project the cosmos onto your bedroom walls when it's time for bed. Comes with a narration by a popular voice actor.
*Love*: Kaito, Maki 
*Like*: All but Korekiyo

96.name: Super Lucky Button
96.desc:
A shiny button that makes its owner feel like their luck will turn around. It may or may not pull in a powerful wave of luck.
Love: N/A
Like: N/A

97.name: Sparkly Sheet
97.desc:
A cleaning sheet that gets rid of any mess in the kitchen sink or dirt on the faucet. Can also be used to clean robots.
*Love*: K1-B0, Kirumi 
*Like*: Kaede, Miu, Shuichi

98.name: Hammock
98.desc:
Bedding created by hanging a net between two poles or trees. Lounging in one of these is something everyone has dreamed of at least once.
*Love*: Kokichi, Ryoma 
*Like*: Angie, Kaito, Rantaro, Tenko

99.name: Cleansing Air Freshener
99.desc:
A spray air freshener. It has holy water mixed in, and is said to repel ghosts and paranormal entities.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kaito, Kirumi, Kokichi, Tsumugi

100.name: Flower for Floromancy
100.desc:
'Loves me, loves me not, loves me...' An artificial flower used for flower fortune-telling. It has an odd number of petals to soothe the pain of unrequited love.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Tenko

101.name: Marigold Seeds
101.desc:
Marigold seeds that bloom into colorful flowers. By way, marigolds symbolize 'despair.'
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Gonta, Kaede, Kaito, Kiurmi, Rantaro, Tsumugi

102.name: Rock-Paper-Scissors Cards
102.desc:
A set of cards containing four rocks, four papers, and four scissors. If you bet your life on this game, it can be a thrilling psychological battle.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Kaito, Kokichi, Rantaro, Tsumugi

103.name: Perfect Laser Gun
103.desc:
A replica of a laser gun used by upstanding citizens to punish rebellious or unhappy people. When carrying it around, be sure to watch your coefficient.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, K1-B0, Kokichi, Miu, Tsumugi

104.name: Someone's Student ID
104.desc:
A replica of a student ID from some academy. There are many different designs of ID as there are talented students.
*Love*: None
*Like*: K1-B0, Rantaro, Tsumugi

105.name: Bear Ears
105.desc:
A headband with Monokuma ears. When worn, it picks up your brainwaves and the ears wiggle according to your emotions.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Gonta, Himiko, Kaede, Miu, Ryoma, Tenko

106.name: Dangan Werewolf
106.desc:
A party game of hope and despair. Draw cards and become the characters to start deducing and debating! Now on sale!
*Love*: None
*Like*: K1-B0, Kaito, Kokichi, Korekiyo, Rantaro, Ryoma, Tsumugi

107.name: Tentacle Machine
107.desc:
An extremely handy reacher grabber. Once you use it, you can't live without it.
*Love*: Angie, Miu 
*Like*: Kaito, Kokichi

108.name: Rice Toy Blocks
108.desc:
Toy blocks made out of rice, so they're safe for babies to put in their mouths. But they'll go bad if they aren't eaten right away.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Maki

109.name: Cosmic Blanket
109.desc:
Aluminum film that makes excellent insulation. It warms your body when you wrap it around yourself, making it handy for outdoor actives.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Himiko, Kaito, Korekiyo, Rantaro

110.name: Fully-Automated Shaved Ice Machine
110.desc:
A shaved ice machine that automatically crushes up ice and pours strawberry syrup on top.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Angie, Gonta, Himiko, Kaito, Kirumi, Kokichi, Maki, Miu, Tenko

111.name: Gun of Man's Passion
111.desc:
A model of an imaginary weapon. It's powerful, but only the worthy may fire it.
Love: Shuichi
*Like*: None

112.name: Pure-White Practice Sword
112.desc:
An ornamental katakana that contains a divine power capable of taking out ordinary people with a single slash.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Tsumugi

113.name: Dark Belt
113.desc:
A black-ish belt worn with karate clothes. It can only be worn by those with justice in their hearts.
*Love*: None
*Like*: Gonta, K1-B0, Kaito, Kokichi, Tenko

150.name: Love Key
150.desc: A key to certain places filled with greed and lust. You can give it away, but something good might happen if you keep it.

151.name: Golden Love Key
151.desc: Legends say that this key was the bridge that made Lovers reunite again. This key... it has three prongs... could that mean something?

152.name: Sex Bender Stone
152.desc: This stone can help you change sex for a day. A lot easier then buckets of cold and hot water.

153.name: Animalea Stone
153.desc: Summon your inner beast by using this stone in form of animal ears, tail or whatever your inner animal is. Effect is temporary.

154.name: Turn 180 Stone
154.desc: Don't like somebody's personality? Now you can change it. This stone will turn their personality 180 degrees around. Though, they probably beat you up when they return to normal.

161.name: Wedding Rings
161.desc: Wedding rings, which tied your destiny with Mono- emmmm your lover. Have symbol of Gifted Inmates Academy engraved in it.
